primary_market.label: Choose the market (country) where the service is required
primary_market.supportingContent: This is not a list of all countries, but those where DIT currently provide this service.

hint.create: For example International trade advisers or language advisers. They will be informed of the order once you submit it.
hint.edit: For example International trade advisers or language advisers

description.label: Description of the work or activity

contacts_not_to_approach.label: Specific people or organisations the company does not want DIT to talk to

existing_agents.label: Contacts the company already has in the market

further_info.label: Additional notes and useful information
further_info.hint: For example other client comments or requirements

assignees.hint: For example post advisers or other in-country staff
assignees.label: Adviser

quote.service_types: Choose at least one service type the order covers
quote.description: Add a description of the work or activity
quote.delivery_date: Set a delivery date of at least 21 days from now
quote.assignees: Add at least one adviser in the market
quote.assignee_time: Allocate time to at least one adviser in the market

validation.isDuration: must be a whole number, for example 1
validation.isGreaterThanAmount: must be equal to or larger than the invoice amount
